{% raw %}

get_rows[source]

get_rows(df, codes, cols=None, sep=None, pid='pid')

Make a boolean series that is true for all rows that contain the codes

Args df (dataframe or series): The dataframe with codes codes (str, list, set, dict): codes to be counted cols (str or list): list of columns to search in sep (str): The symbol that seperates the codes if there are multiple codes in a cell pid (str): The name of the column with the personal identifier

{% endraw %}
